thread.title: PlayStation 4 Price Gets Cut in Europe
thread.title_full: PlayStation 4 Price Gets Cut in Europe - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: PlayStation 4 Price Gets Cut in Europe
text: Sony Computer Entertainment has dropped the price for the 500GB PlayStation 4 video game console in a few regions, including Europe. Rumors about a price cut for PlayStation 4 have been floating around for some time, with Microsoft being one of the first to say this publicly a while back. Well, as it turns out, the rumors were true, but no one really expected them to be false. Sony is known to pull these kinds of moves before the holiday season, but this is in fact just ... Â»
